alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 555 PM EDT/455 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blountstown, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Red Oak, Selman, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Kennys Mill, Nettle Ridge, Blountstown Airport, Macedonia, Hugh Creek and Durham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
